title: Topic 001 Question 040
body: You need to redesign the architecture of an application that currently uses Cloud SQL for PostgreSQL. The users of the application complain about slow query response times. You want to enhance your application architecture to offer sub-millisecond query latency. What should you do?
options: Configure Firestore, and modify your application to offload queries.
Configure Bigtable, and modify your application to offload queries.
Configure Cloud SQL for PostgreSQL read replicas to offload queries.
Configure Memorystore, and modify your application to offload queries.
